ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Project', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Propose / Quote'), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Competition_Positioning__c,""), ISBLANK( RFQ_Received_Date__c), NOT(X3rd_Party_Buyouts_Required__c), ISPICKVAL(Non_standard_Products_Approved__c,""), ISBLANK(Application__c), ISBLANK(Category_of_Interest__c), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c,""), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Competition Positioning, RFQ Received Date, 3rd Party Buyouts Required, Non-standard Products Approved and Application are mandatory fields to move to the Propose/Quote stage
